title: The Plan
creator_credit: C Larry Roberts, Dianne Orr and Bescher Films
brief_description: Features Michele Meservy, Utah’s Young Mother of the Year for 1978. Follows this intelligent and committed Mormon Mother through the rigours of her day, taking care of her five young children and husband, and reflecting on her life, obligations and spiritual destiny.
